sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import { Link, withRouter } from "react-router-dom"; import { Layout, Menu } from "antd"; import { HomeOutlined, UserOutlined,MenuOutlined,BookOutlined,PaperClipOutlined} from "@ant-design/icons"; import "./MenuSider.scss"; function MenuSider(props) { const { menuCollapsed, location } = props; const { Sider } = Layout; return ( Home Usuarios Menu Cursos Blog ); } export default withRouter(MenuSider);
